text: The men's 20 kilometres race walk event at the 2003 European Athletics U23 Championships was held in Bydgoszcz, Poland, on 19 July. ==Medalists== {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; " width="35%" |- |bgcolor="gold"|Gold|| Benjamin Kuciński ' |- |bgcolor="silver"|Silver|| Sergey Lystsov ' |- |bgcolor="CC9966"|Bronze|| Andrei Talashka ' |} ==Results== ===Final=== 19 July {| class="wikitable sortable" style="text-align:center" |- !Rank !!
